text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump .
Here’s some data for your “data-driven approach”.

They show the US is in the TOP 7% of countries by DEATHS/MILLION

They show the US is way DOWN at 42nd in THE WORLD by TESTS/MILLION

Trump has DESTROYED remainder of AMERICAN EXCEPTIONALISM

Source:  https://t.co/cKIVQXowBu
